issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Make InstrumentedLock use ReentrantLock instead of Lock, so nested acquire/release calls can be instrumented correctly.

comments.body: The patch also renames InstrumentedLock to InstrumentedReentrantLock.
